entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer No one has died in the US from the Coronavirus, 60 people total in the US have it. More people than that are killed in the democrat controlled Chicago area each month. How about working on something you democrats should be able to fix instead of politicizing this issue.
